description_en: Paid plans only The Find Results Bar is displayed either when you search for text in an event sheet (using Ctrl + F or Event sheet ► Find... ), or when you use the Find all references feature (e.g. via the Project Bar to search for an object type's references). The results are listed with highlighting and information about their location, and they can be used to navigate to the result in the project.
